CONSOLE WARNING: motion-rotation is deprecated and will be removed in M58, around April 2017. Please use offset-rotate instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/6390764217040896 for more details.
This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS motion-rotation default is auto 
PASS motion-rotation auto expands to auto 0deg 
PASS motion-rotation reverse expands to auto 180deg 
PASS motion-rotation can be a fixed angle 
PASS motion-rotation angles are converted to degrees 
PASS motion-rotation can be supplied with angle before auto 
PASS motion-rotation can be supplied with angle before reverse 
PASS motion-rotation is unaffected by child elements 
PASS motion-rotation can be explicitly inherited 
PASS motion-rotation is not inherited by default 
PASS motion-rotation style can be set inline 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
